vue-directives.name: translate
vue-directives.description: Translate a key into the user's selected language. Can be used with an argument to translate a specific attribute on the element.

arguments.name: binding.value
arguments.description: The translation key to be looked up.

arguments.name: binding.arg
arguments.description: Specifies the attribute that should be translated (e.g., aria-label).

modifiers.name: lowercase
modifiers.description: Converts the translated text to lowercase.
